summary: This is an internal email chain from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical assistance for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for the following day. The email requests FBI agents to help with victim support and managing the press, noting an anticipated attendance of at least 20 victims.

persons.name: Mr I
persons.role: FBI point of contact for hearing assistance
persons.context: The email author asks recipients to let 'Mr I' know if they are able to assist with the Epstein hearing, indicating he is coordinating support.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case is scheduled for 10:30 AM. The SDNY has requested assistance from agents to help with victims, provide support, and manage the press, with at least 20 victims anticipated to attend.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
The SDNY requested FBI assistance for the hearing, specifically for agent support with victims and press management.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with upwards of 30 anticipated.
